analysis.key_quote: The very premise of creating a new employment category that strips civil servants of due process protections under the guise of “policy alignment” is a blatant affront to the merit-based system that has underpinned the U.S. government for over a century.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of due process protections and the merit-based civil service system, while also warning against the politicization of federal employment.
